Posts.Content: Bianca wrote: There are also naturopathic certification boards as well. For example in Az, it is the Arizona Naturopathic Board of Medical Examiners www.npbomex.gov Bianca Bianca Dx 5/2002, IDC, 3cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Addition to How to check credentials.... Bianca Bianca

Posts.Content: Bianca wrote: Just thought I'd share this tidbit Dear Friends, FORCE is pleased and excited to announce our new publication: Life is a Carnival an 14-month 2008 calendar featuring FORCE members as models. The calendar is an educational piece which demonstrates women's options after mastectomy. To learn more, read the accompanying press release. You can also view an article about our calendar which appeared today in USA Today at: http://www.usatoday.com/news/health/2007-08-26-mastectomy-calendar_N.htm . The calendars will be available after September 18. To learn more about our calendar and to preorder a copy visit: http://www.facingourrisk.org/calendar. Bianca Bianca Dx 5/2002, IDC, 3cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mastectomy Calendar Bianca Bianca
